Disclosure Requirement S1-14 â€“ Health and safety metrics
86. The undertaking shall disclose information on the extent to which its own workforce is
covered by its health and safety management system and the number of incidents
associated with work-related injuries, ill health and fatalities of its own workforce. In
addition, it shall disclose the number of fatalities as a result of work-related injuries and
